home_title: Find Your New Home and Car
home_subtitle: Find your new car and home in Egypt with a specialized marketplace for cars and properties. We offer diverse options, fair prices, and high quality tailored to your needs.
hero_p1: A dedicated marketplace for buying and selling cars and properties in Egypt, with fresh listings and multiple choices for every budget.
hero_p2: With "Clutch Zone" you get trusted cars and properties with clear information and competitive prices.
hero_p3: A platform designed for Egyptian users, focusing on real needs in Cairo and all other governorates.
